sentences.english: After his death, Li Bai was buried at the foot of a hill in Dangtu.
sentences.chinese: 李白死后葬于当涂的一个山脚下。

sentences.english: Applied topically, it will help in the treatment of comedonal acne and inflammatory acne, as well as hyperpigmentation, including melasma.
sentences.chinese: 当涂在肌肤上，能治疗粉刺以及发炎的青春痘。
